ivardefs.name: location
ivardefs.desc: The location where the encounter takes place.

ivardefs.name: period
ivardefs.desc: Time period during which the patient was present at the location.

ivardefs.name: physicalType
ivardefs.desc: This will be used to specify the required levels (bed/ward/room/etc.) desired to be recorded to simplify either messaging or query.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the participants' presence at the specified location during the period specified. If the participant is no longer at the location, then the period will have an end date/time.

properties.desc: List of locations where  the patient has been during this encounter.
